description: Update all E2E tests that verify role-based functionality to use the new single source of truth format. Update tests in: rbac-e2e-tests, e2e-tests-authorization-mutations, e2e-test-two-factor-settings-enable-flow, admin-user-management tests. Ensure: 1) Login steps use admin@refine.dev credentials, 2) Role checks verify correct format (array or string), 3) Admin access tests validate ADMIN role correctly, 4) User role tests validate non-admin roles, 5) Tests verify role-based UI elements appear/disappear correctly. Update test fixtures and mock data to match new role format. Add new test cases verifying the refactored role implementation works end-to-end. Ensure tests catch any regressions where old role format is accidentally used.
